channel.title: Walkable Interface
channel.description:
I'm having a problem with walkable interfaces. Like ones that are declared in different classes for like mini games, work fine. But if I go to do something like this:
[code]walkableInterface(44195);[/code] For leveling up in PlayerAssistant.java because I'm adding the new level up interfaces. It crashes my client when it attempts to pop up.
Error: [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/Capture-8.png[/img]
Client: Galkons Refactored Server: PI

item.title: Walkable Interface
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Line 10537 of client.java? Extend the array that is there.
